text: "Ordinary Day" is a 2002 song by Vanessa Carlton and is the second single from her debut studio album Be Not Nobody. It went to number 5 in Belgium, number 17 in New Zealand, number 30 in the United States and number 48 in Australia. It is the follow up to her smash hit A Thousand Miles. Category:2002 songs Category:2000s ballads Category:Pop ballads Category:Vanessa Carlton songs
title: Ordinary Day (Vanessa Carlton song)
